trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Allow some nonintrusive ads"; ObjectID = "3FL-nd-DlQ";

trans-unit.source: 1. Go to iOS Settings → Safari → Content Blockers
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "1. Go to iOS Settings → Safari → Content Blockers"; ObjectID = "9TK-Zf-1G9";
trans-unit.target: 1. Diríjase a Configuración → Safari → Bloqueadores de contenido

trans-unit.source: We'd like to encourage websites to use straightforward, nonintrusive advertising. That's why we've established strict guidelines to identify Acceptable Ads, which are shown under default settings. If you wish to browse ad-free, you can disable this setting at any time.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "We'd like to encourage websites to use straightforward, nonintrusive advertising. That's why we've established strict guidelines to identify Acceptable Ads, which are shown under default settings. If you wish to browse ad-free, you can disable this setting at any time."; ObjectID = "94r-nm-jV7";
trans-unit.target: Nos gustaría animar a las páginas web a que usen publicidad honesta, no intrusiva. Por eso hemos establecido unas reglas estrictas para identificar los anuncios aceptables que se mostrarán de forma predeterminada. Si todavía quiere bloquear toda la publicidad, puede desactivar esta configuración en cualquier momento.

trans-unit.source: Annoying ads are always blocked, while nonintrusive ads are displayed by default. You can change this setting at any time.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Annoying ads are always blocked, while nonintrusive ads are displayed by default. You can change this setting at any time."; ObjectID = "CNX-VR-6h9";
trans-unit.target: Siempre se bloqueará la publicidad molesta, mientras que la no intrusiva se permitirá de forma predeterminada. Esta configuración se puede cambiar en cualquier momento.

trans-unit.note: Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Download on the App Store"; ObjectID = "TUG-U9-6x7";

trans-unit.source: 2. Enable Adblock Plus and wait for 10 seconds
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "2. Enable Adblock Plus and wait for 10 seconds"; ObjectID = "Thw-XS-bUp";
trans-unit.target: 2. Active Adblock Plus y espere 10 segundos

trans-unit.source: To get a better ad blocking experience, use Adblock *Browser* for iOS
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "To get a better ad blocking experience, use Adblock (unbreakable space character)*Browser* for iOS"; ObjectID = "VJZ-V3-ohd";
trans-unit.target: Para tener una mejor experiencia de bloqueo de anuncios, utilice Adblock *Browser* para iOS

trans-unit.source: Tap the Settings icon → Acceptable Ads
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Tap the Settings icon → Acceptable Ads"; ObjectID = "euz-Uy-cr5";
trans-unit.target: Toque el ícono Configuración → Anuncios Aceptables

trans-unit.source: Adblock Plus won't work if you don't configure your Safari settings. Don't worry, we'll show you how.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Adblock Plus won't work if you don't configure your Safari settings. Don't worry, we'll show you how."; ObjectID = "jgu-sr-NP6";
trans-unit.target: Adblock Plus no funcionará si no realiza la configuración de Safari. No se preocupe, le mostraremos cómo hacerlo.

trans-unit.source: To enable ad blocking in Safari
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "To enable ad blocking in Safari"; ObjectID = "kFT-cY-IYR";
trans-unit.target: Para activar el bloqueo de anuncios en Safari

trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Last filter list update: %@"; ObjectID = "z6o-iS-GOv";
trans-unit.target: Última actualización de la lista de filtros: %@
AÑADIR SITIO WEB A LISTA BLANCA

trans-unit.id: Failed to update filter lists. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Failed to update filter lists. Please try again later.
trans-unit.note: Message of filter update failure dialog
trans-unit.target: Error al actualizar las listas de filtros. Por favor, inténtelo de nuevo más tarde.

trans-unit.note: Title of filter update failure dialog
trans-unit.target: Error al actualizar las listas de filtros
